about.title: About Astro Studios
about.subtitle: Two passionate creators building worlds of imagination.
about.paragraph1: Founded with a shared love for creating unique gaming experiences, Astro Studios is a small but dedicated indie game development team. We're just two people, but our passion drives us to create games that stand out and leave a lasting impression.
about.paragraph2: We believe in pushing creative boundaries while keeping our games accessible and enjoyable. From puzzle games to narrative adventures, our diverse portfolio reflects our versatility and commitment to quality.
about.paragraph3: Each game we create is a labor of love, crafted with attention to detail and a desire to bring something new to the gaming world.
